content.text1: In partnership with Be In Christ Church of Canada, we're excited to pilot the concept of The Meeting House Extended Family churches as part of our vision to grow loving communities of Jesus followers beyond our existing parishes. Extended Family churches are locally-operated Meeting House expressions that share the Jesus-centered theology, core values, vision, and ministry approach of The Meeting House.
These are the folks that help make community, discipleship, and Sunday mornings happen.

We work together to create a safe community where our kids and youth can learn to love and follow Jesus. We do this through building relationships, equipping parents, and developing our own curriculum.

content.text1: When you give, you become a participant in a counter-cultural movement of disciples who want to transform their neighbourhoods and cities by helping grow loving communities of Jesus-followers who live and share his irreligious message. Your giving makes a difference in the lives of others, and in your own life.

content.text1: Something really good happens when we gather in our neighbourhoods to share life, grow deeper spiritual friendships, and talk about how we can live Jesus-centred lives, all while we invite others to join us.
We want to use our money, time, and resources to love and serve people on the margins.
